name: Revolve Around Me
description:
Protect Earth: Geocentrism at its finest

Controls

Up/Down Keys: Increase/Decrease Circle

Left/Right Keys: Rotate

Ctrl+R: Restart

X: Play a different version of the game

S: Move Earth Left

F: Move Earth Right

E:Move Earth Up

D: Move Earth Down

Left/Right: Rotate 

Patched: Issue with asteroid initially colliding with the borders

music from pico tunes vol. 2 by @gruber_music / @krajzeg/@castpixel
